mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, black and gold on white) announcing the Sixth Annual Wrangler / City of Hope Celebrity Softball Challenge and Concert at Greer Stadium on June 9. Poster features a woodcut of a baseball player.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
